Post.title: Three.js-PhotoSphereViewer
Post.author: Marshall
Post.content:
Three.jsThree.jsPhoto Sphere ViewerThree.js

Photo Sphere Viewer

npmyarn

npm install photo-sphere-viewer

yarn add photo-sphere-viewer

CDN

jsDelivr

  • Three.js (build/three.min.js)
  • uEvent 2(browser.js)

  • promise-polyfill IE (dist/polyfill.min.js)

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/photo-sphere-viewer@4/dist/photo-sphere-viewer.min.css"/>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three/build/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/uevent@2/browser.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/photo-sphere-viewer@4/dist/photo-sphere-viewer.min.js"></script>

<div id="viewer"></div>

<style>
    /* the viewer container must have a defined size */
    #viewer {
        width: 100vw;
        height: 50vh;
    }
</style>

<script>
    var viewer = new PhotoSphereViewer.Viewer({
        container: document.querySelector('#viewer'),
        panorama: 'path/to/panorama.jpg'
    });
</script>

panorama

panorama

Photo Sphere ViewerPhoto Sphere Viewer

new PhotoSphereViewer.Viewer({
  adapter: PhotoSphereViewer.CubemapAdapter,
  panorama: {
    left:   'path/to/left.jpg',
    front:  'path/to/front.jpg',
    right:  'path/to/right.jpg',
    back:   'path/to/back.jpg',
    top:    'path/to/top.jpg',
    bottom: 'path/to/bottom.jpg',
  },
});
// 
panorama: [
  'path/to/left.jpg',
  'path/to/front.jpg',
  'path/to/right.jpg',
  'path/to/back.jpg',
  'path/to/top.jpg',
  'path/to/bottom.jpg',
]

()

new PhotoSphereViewer.Viewer({
  adapter: PhotoSphereViewer.EquirectangularTilesAdapter,
  panorama: {
    width: 6000,
    cols: 16,
    rows: 8,
    baseUrl: 'low_res.jpg',
    tileUrl: (col, row) => {
      return `tile_${col}x${row}.jpg`;
    },
  },
});

width()

  • :number

/ 2

cols()

  • :number

24616326464

rows()

  • :number

2246163232

tileUrl()

  • :function: (col, row) => string

URL

baseUrl()

  • :string

URL

ImageMagick

8192x409632168192/32=256,4096/32=256

magick panorama.jpg -crop 256x256 tile_%04d.jpg

let pano={
    desc: 'example',
    minFov: 30,
    base: `./img/lowQualityImg/example_low.JPG`,
    position: {longitude: 0, latitude: 0, zoom: 50,},
    config: {
        width: 8192,
        cols: 32,
        rows: 16,
        tileUrl: (col, row) => {
            const num = row * 32 + col
            return `./img/example/tile_${('000' + num).slice(-4)}.jpg`;
        },
    },
}

api()

function loadPanorama(pano) {
    const loader = new THREE.ImageLoader();

    viewer.loader.show();

    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => loader.load(pano.base, resolve, undefined, reject))
        .then(image => {
            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
            canvas.width = image.width;
            canvas.height = image.height;

            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            ctx.drawImage(image, 0, 0);
            ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)';
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

            return canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
        })
        .then(baseUrl => {
            return viewer.setPanorama({
                ...pano.config,
                baseUrl: baseUrl,
            }, pano.position);
        })
        .then(() => {
            viewer.navbar.setCaption(pano.desc);
            viewer.setOption('minFov', pano.minFov);
        });
}

var panos=[
        {
        desc: 'viewer1',
        minFov: 30,
        base: `./assets/img/lowQualityImg/viewer_low.JPG`,
        position: {longitude: 0, latitude: 0, zoom: 50,},
        config: {
            width: 8192,
            cols: 32,
            rows: 16,
            tileUrl: (col, row) => {
                const num = row * 32 + col
                return `./assets/img/viewer1/tile_${('000' + num).slice(-4)}.jpg`;
            },
        },
    },
    {
        desc: 'viewer2',
        minFov: 30,
        base: `./assets/img/lowQualityImg/viewer2_low.JPG`,
        position: {longitude: 1.8939487733283173, latitude: 0.03337838088394118, zoom: 50},
        config: {
            width: 8192,
            cols: 32,
            rows: 16,
            tileUrl: (col, row) => {
                const num = row * 32 + col
                return `./assets/img/viewer2/tile_${('000' + num).slice(-4)}.jpg`;
            },
        },
    }
]

loadPanorama(panos[1])

Post.title: Node.js:async/await
Post.author: Marshall
Post.content:
Async/await ES7 async/await HTTP DB Promise async/await

Node.js:await

try/catch

async function asyncFunc() {
    try {
        const token = await verifyToken(token);
        console.log(token)
    }
    catch(err) {
        console.log(err);
    }
}

try/catch async/await

to.js

1.CommonJSawait-to-js

$ npm i await-to-js --save
1.
const to = require('await-to-js').default;
2.
const[err,res]=await to(verifyToken(token))
if(err){
   console.log(err)
}else{
    console.log(res)
}

2.to.js

export default function to(promise) {
   return promise.then(data => {
      return [null, data];
   })
   .catch(err => [err]);
}
import to from './to.js'
const[err,res]=await to(verifyToken(token))
if(err){
   console.log(err)
}else{
    console.log(res)
}
Post.more:

2.

if(err){
   console.log(err)
}else{
    console.log(res)

2.to.js

export default function to(promise) {
   return promise.then(data => {
      return [null, data];
   })
   .catch(err => [err]);
}
import to from './to.js'
const[err,res]=await to(verifyToken(token))
if(err){
   console.log(err)
}else{
    console.log(res)
}

Post.content:
Vuempvue

webpack entry entry npm run dev

page onLoad options?

UI?

npmgit clonedistapp.jsonusingComponentsvant-weapp van-button

{
  ...,
  "usingComponents": {
    "van-button": "/static/vant/button/index",
    ...
  },
  ...
}

mpvuevan-field

<van-field
    value="{{ value }}"
    placeholder=""
    border="{{ false }}"
    bind:change="onChange"
/>
Page({
    data: {
        value: '',
    },

    onChange(event) {
        console.log(event.detail);
    },
});

<van-field
    :value="value"
    placeholder=""
    :border="false"
    @input="value=$event.mp.detail"
/>
export default{
    data(){
        return{
            value: ''
        }
    }
}

mpvueattributemustache style{{value}}{{}}:DOM@

<input value="{{value}}" />
//
<input :value="value" />

<view id="tapTest" bindtap="tapName"> Click me! </view>
//
<view id="tapTest" @click="tapName"> Click me! </view>

DOM

WEB 

{
    click: 'tap',
    touchstart: 'touchstart',
    touchmove: 'touchmove',
    touchcancel: 'touchcancel',
    touchend: 'touchend',
    tap: 'tap',
    longtap: 'longtap',
    input: 'input',
    change: 'change',
    submit: 'submit',
    blur: 'blur',
    focus: 'focus',
    reset: 'reset',
    confirm: 'confirm',
    columnchange: 'columnchange',
    linechange: 'linechange',
    error: 'error',
    scrolltoupper: 'scrolltoupper',
    scrolltolower: 'scrolltolower',
    scroll: 'scroll'
}

Vuempvue

mpvue

click

// 
this.trigger('click', index);
// 
this.trigger('vclick', index);
<van-tabs :active="active" @vclick="handleClick">
handleClick ({ mp }) {
  console.log(mp.detail.index)
}

style tagscoped

/*divclass cover*/
.cover {
  background-color: #e5e5e5;
  height: 100%;
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  overscroll-behavior-y: contain;
}


<style lang="stylus" rel="stylesheet/stylus" scoped>
@import "../../../static/stylus/mixin.styl"
body
  background-color #fff
</style>

request

requestwx.requestPromise

//
import Config from './config'
import Token from './token'

function request (url, method, data, header = {}, noRefetch = false) {
  wx.showLoading({
    title: '' //  loading
  })
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    wx.request({
      url: Config.baseUrl + url,
      method: method,
      data: data,
      header: {
        'token': wx.getStorageSync('token'),
        'content-type': 'application/json'
      },
      success: function (res) {
        let code = res.statusCode.toString()
        let startChar = code.charAt(0)
        if (startChar === '2') {
          resolve(res.data)
        } else {
          if (code === '401') {
            if (!noRefetch) {
              Token.getTokenFromServer().then((token) => {
                //  token
                request(url, method, data, {}, true).then((res) => {
                  resolve(res)
                })
              })
            }
          } else {
            reject(res)
          }
        }
      },
      fail: function (error) {
        reject(error)
      },
      complete: function () {
        wx.hideLoading()
      }
    })
  })
}
function get (obj) {
  return request(obj.url, 'GET', obj.data)
}
function post (obj) {
  return request(obj.url, 'POST', obj.data)
}

export default {
  request,
  get,
  post
}

promisify

apipromise

/**
 * callbackapipromise
 *
 * 
 *     import {promisify} from '...' // 
 *     const res= await promisify(wx.showModal,{content:''})
 */
export function promisify( api, options, ...params ) {
  return new Promise( (resolve, reject) => {
    api( Object.assign( {},  options,  {
      success: resolve,
      fail: reject
    } ), ...params )
  } ).catch( err=>console.log(err) )
}

// 
export default {
  promisify
}
Post.more:

requestwx.requestPromise

//
import Config from './config'
import Token from './token'

function request (url, method, data, header = {}, noRefetch = false) {
  wx.showLoading({
    title: '' //  loading
  })
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    wx.request({
      url: Config.baseUrl + url,
      method: method,
      data: data,
      header: {
        'token': wx.getStorageSync('token'),
        'content-type': 'application/json'
      },
      success: function (res) {
        let code = res.statusCode.toString()
        let startChar = code.charAt(0)
        if (startChar === '2') {
          resolve(res.data)
        } else {
          if (code === '401') {
            if (!noRefetch) {
              Token.getTokenFromServer().then((token) => {
                //  token
                request(url, method, data, {}, true).then((res) => {
                  resolve(res)
                })
              })
            }
          } else {
            reject(res)
          }
        }
      },
      fail: function (error) {
        reject(error)
      },
      complete: function () {
        wx.hideLoading()
      }
    })
  })
}
function get (obj) {
  return request(obj.url, 'GET', obj.data)
}
function post (obj) {
  return request(obj.url, 'POST', obj.data)
}

export default {
  request,
  get,
  post
}

      fail: reject

Post.title: mpvuevant-weapp
Post.author: Marshall
Post._content:
mpvuecsstailwind[Vant Weapp](https://vant-contrib.gitee.io/vant-weapp/#/home) 

## mpvueVant Weapp

### 1.
> static 

#### npm
``` bash
$ npm i @vant/weapp -S --production
```
 `node_modules/vant-weapp/dist` copy  `static/vant` 
#### git clone

```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/youzan/vant-weapp.git
```
 `dist`  `/static/vant/` 
### 2.
#### 2.1 
##### 
`src\app.json`
```json
"usingComponents": {
"van-button": "/static/vant/button/index",
}
```
###### 
 `main.json` 

#### 2.2 
.vue

### 
 api [Vant Weapp](https://vant-contrib.gitee.io/vant-weapp/#/home)
#### 
mpvue[mpvue](http://mpvue.com/)
##### 1.

###### 
```html
<button value="{{value}}"></button>
```
mpvue 
```html
<button v-bind:value="value"></button>
<button :value="value"></button> 
```
###### van-field 

```vue
<van-field :value="registerform.username" label="" name="username" placeholder="" @input="registerform.username=$event.mp.detail"></van-field>
<button type="primary" @click="register"></button>
```
```js
export default{
    ...,
    data(){
        return{
            registerform:{
                username:'',
                ...
            }
            
        }
    },methods:{
        async register(){
            let{
                username,
                ...
            }={
                username:this.$data.registerform.username,
                ...
            }
                ...;
        }
        
    }
        
}
```

##### 2.

```vue
bind:click="onClick"
```
mpvue 
```vue
@click="onClick"
```

##### 3. event 
mpvueevent
```vue
onChange(event){ // filed
  console.log(event.mp.detail) // mp
}
```

.vue

### 
 api [Vant Weapp](https://vant-contrib.gitee.io/vant-weapp/#/home)
#### 
mpvue[mpvue](http://mpvue.com/)
##### 1.

###### 
```html
<button value="{{value}}"></button>
```
mpvue 
```html
<button v-bind:value="value"></button>
<button :value="value"></button> 
```
###### van-field 

```vue
<van-field :value="registerform.username" label="" name="username" placeholder="" @input="registerform.username=$event.mp.detail"></van-field>
<button type="primary" @click="register"></button>
```
```js
export default{
    ...,
    data(){
        return{
            registerform:{
                username:'',
                ...
            }
            
        }
    },methods:{
        async register(){
            let{
                username,
                ...
            }={
                username:this.$data.registerform.username,
                ...
            }
                ...;
        }
        
    }
        
}
```

##### 2.

```vue
bind:click="onClick"
```
mpvue 
```vue
@click="onClick"
```

##### 3. event 
mpvueevent
```vue
onChange(event){ // filed
  console.log(event.mp.detail) // mp
}
```

Post.title: VueElectron
Post.author: Marshall
Post.content:
Electron

Electron QQnode.jsnode.js

1. electron

vue add electron-builder

srcbackground.jspackage.json

2.

npm run electron:serve

Error: post install error, please remove node_modules before retry! node_modulesnpm installelectronnode_moduleselectronnpm install electronelectronnpmyarnnpm

3.

npm run electron:build

1. Vuex

1.Vuex

npm install vuexvuexbuildvuexelectronvuex

npm install vuex-electron --save

2.Vuex

srcstoreindex.js

Vuex Electronindex.js

import Vue from "vue"
import Vuex from "vuex"

import { createPersistedState, createSharedMutations } from "vuex-electron"

Vue.use(Vuex)

export default new Vuex.Store({
  state: {
    count: 0
  },

  actions: {
    increment(store) {
      store.commit("increment")
    },
    decrement(store) {
      store.commit("decrement")
    }
  },

  mutations: {
    increment(state) {
      state.count++
    },
    decrement(state) {
      state.count--
    }
  },

  plugins: [createPersistedState(), createSharedMutations()],
  strict: process.env.NODE_ENV !== "production"
})

this.$sotre.commitPlease, don't use direct commit's, use dispatch instead of this.importcreateSharedMutations

createSharedMutationsdispatch

2.

1..vueelectronApi

src/main.js

import electron from 'electron'
Vue.prototype.$electron = electron;

vue.config.js'__dirname' is not defind

module.exports = {
    pluginOptions: {
        electronBuilder: {
            nodeIntegration: true
        }
    }
}

2..vuethis.$electron.remoteundefined

enableRemoteModule: true
srcbackground.js

const win = new BrowserWindow({
        width: 400,
        height: 400,
        frame: false,
        resizable: false,
        webPreferences: {
            // Use pluginOptions.nodeIntegration, leave this alone
            // See nklayman.github.io/vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder/guide/security.html#node-integration for more info
            nodeIntegration: process.env.ELECTRON_NODE_INTEGRATION,
            enableRemoteModule: process.env.ELECTRON_NODE_INTEGRATION
        }
    });

vue.config.js

module.exports = {
    pluginOptions: {
        electronBuilder: {
            nodeIntegration: true,
            enableRemoteModule: true
        }
    }
}

3.

background.jsMenu

import {app, protocol, BrowserWindow, Menu, dialog} from 'electron'

createWindow()

const win = new BrowserWindow({
  width: 1294,
  height: 800,
  webPreferences: {

    // Use pluginOptions.nodeIntegration, leave this alone
    // See nklayman.github.io/vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder/guide/security.html#node-integration for more info
    nodeIntegration: process.env.ELECTRON_NODE_INTEGRATION,
    contextIsolation: !process.env.ELECTRON_NODE_INTEGRATION,
    enableRemoteModule: process.env.ELECTRON_NODE_INTEGRATION
  }
})
Menu.setApplicationMenu(null)

4.buildexe

vue.config.js

module.exports = {
    publicPath: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? './' : '/',
    pluginOptions: {
        electronBuilder: {
            nodeIntegration: true,
            builderOptions: {
                'appId': 'example',
                'productName': 'example', // mzDemo.exe
                'copyright': 'Marshall Copyright  2021', // 
                'files': [
                    './**/*'
                ],
                'directories': {
                    'output': './app_dist' // 
                },
                'win': { // win
                    'icon': './public/favicon.ico', // 
                    "requestedExecutionLevel": "requireAdministrator", //
                    'target': [{
                        'target': 'nsis', // nsis
                        'arch': [
                            'x64', // 64
                            'ia32'
                        ]
                    }]
                },
                artifactName: '${productName}_Setup_${version}_${platform}.${ext}',
                'nsis': {
                    include: './installer.nsh',//
                    'oneClick': false, // 
                    'allowElevation': true, //  false
                    'allowToChangeInstallationDirectory': true, // 
                    'installerIcon': './favicon.ico', // 
                    'uninstallerIcon': './favicon.ico', // 
                    'installerHeaderIcon': './favicon.ico', // 
                    'createDesktopShortcut': true, // 
                    'createStartMenuShortcut': true, // 
                    'shortcutName': 'nfuEcampusUtils' // ()
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

,nsisinclude : './installer.nsh' installer.nsh:

!macro preInit
  SetRegView 64
  WriteRegExpandStr HKLM "${INSTALL_REGISTRY_KEY}" InstallLocation "C:\Program Files\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
  WriteRegExpandStr HKCU "${INSTALL_REGISTRY_KEY}" InstallLocation "C:\Program Files\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
  SetRegView 32
  WriteRegExpandStr HKLM "${INSTALL_REGISTRY_KEY}" InstallLocation "C:\Program Files (x86)\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
  WriteRegExpandStr HKCU "${INSTALL_REGISTRY_KEY}" InstallLocation "C:\Program Files (x86)\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
!macroend

5.

Electron GitHub Releases

oss

vue.config.jsbuilderOptions

module.exports={
    ...,
    pluginOptions:{
    	electronBuilder{
    		
    		builderOptions:{
    			...,
    			publish:[{provider: 'generic',url:'https://yourdomain.com/app'}],
                 ...
			}		
		}
	}
}

background.js

npm install electron-updater
const {autoUpdater} = require('electron-updater')
async function createWindow() {
	const win = new BrowserWindow({
        ...,
        if (process.env.WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER_URL) {
        await win.loadURL(process.env.WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER_URL)
        if (!process.env.IS_TEST) win.webContents.openDevTools()
    }else{
        createProtocol('app')
        win.loadURL('app://./index.html')
        autoUpdater.checkForUpdates()
    }
    })
}
// ======================================================================
// 
// ======================================================================
if (!process.env.WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER_URL) {
  autoUpdater.autoDownload = false

  // autoUpdater.signals.updateDownloaded(() => {})
  autoUpdater.on('error', (error) => {
    log.warn(': ' + error == null ? 'unknown' : (error.stack || error).toString())
    dialog.showErrorBox('Error: ', error == null ? 'unknown' : (error.stack || error).toString())
  })

  autoUpdater.on('update-available', (info) => {
    // var appInfo = {
    //   info: info.version,
    //   files: info.files,
    //   path: info.path,
    //   sha512: info.sha512,
    //   releaseDate: info.releaseDate
    // }
    console.log(info)
    dialog.showMessageBox({
      type: 'info',
      title: '',
      message: '',
      buttons: ['', '']
    }).then((res) => {
      log.warn('index:' + res.response)
      if (res.response === 1) {
        log.warn('')
        autoUpdater.downloadUpdate()
      } else {
        log.warn(':')
      }
    })
  })

  // 
  autoUpdater.on('update-available', (res) => {
    log.warn('')
    log.warn(res)
    // dialog.showMessageBox({
    //   title: '',
    //   message: ''
    // })
  })

  // 
  autoUpdater.on('update-not-available', () => {
    log.warn('')
    // dialog.showMessageBox({
    //   title: '',
    //   message: ''
    // })
  })

  // 
  autoUpdater.on('update-downloaded', (res) => {
    log.warn(res)
    // console.log(res)
    log.warn('')
    dialog.showMessageBox({
      title: '',
      message: ''
    }, () => {
      log.warn('')
      setImmediate(() => autoUpdater.quitAndInstall(true, true))
    })
  })

  //
  autoUpdater.on('download-progress', (event) => {
    log.warn(event.percent)
  })
}

build(1.0.0)

dist_electron *.blockmap ;

(http://yourdomain.com/app/) ;

(1.1.0)

dist_electron

  • .exe
  • _v1.1.0.blockmap
  • latest.yml

(http://yourdomain.com/app/) ;

*.blockmap (.exe)
